```{r}
fit <- lm(mpg ~ qsec + factor(am) + wt + factor(gear), data = mtcars)
```

```{r}
fit
```

```{r}
summary(fit)
```

```{r}
library(broom)
tidy(fit)
```

```{r}
library(dustpan)
dust(fit)
```

```{r}
dust(fit) + 
  sprinkle(row = c(2, 4), bold=TRUE) + 
  sprinkle(col = 2:4, round=3) + 
  sprinkle(col = 5, fn = quote(pvalString(value))) + 
  sprinkle_colnames("Term", "Estimate", "SE", "T-Statistic", "P-value") + 
  sprinkle_colnames(term = "Factor") + 
  sprinkle_print_method("html")
```
